string.value: An unidentified spaceship has crashed in Maple World. Talk to #b#p9250156##k, who is in each town, and go to the spaceship crash site.

A spaceship presumably belonging to aliens has crash landed in Maple World. An organization called the OSSS seems to be investigating it. Investigate the cube-shaped spaceship and defeat the leader of the aliens before returning to #b#p9250154##k.
You explored the alien cube and defeated the Ultimate Visitor.\r\nBut why do you feel as if you've been here before...
Hello, I'm Wynn, an OSSS Researcher. Are you here because you heard the news?\r\n#L0##bYes. Whoa! A spaceship really did crash!#l\n#k

We've done a preliminary investigation of the interior. The beings, which we presume to be aliens, are inside and they seem to have a leader commanding them.\r\n#L0##bBeings presumed to be aliens...? What could they possibly want from us?#l\n#k

That's what I want to find out. We need people to go in and investigate. Interested?
#L0##bYes. That's why I'm here!#l
#L1#Nah, sounds dangerous.#l
#k
You are very brave. \r\nSo, will you accept?
Thank you. Please talk to me again and I will let you in.
Once you've investigated the Cube, don't forget to report back.
Have you finished exploring the Spaceship?\r\n#L0##bYes. I fought quite a few aliens. In the last cube, I encountered a very powerful alien.#l\n#k
Were you able to find out anything about their purpose?\r\n#L0##bNo. They refused to talk. The strange thing is... I felt like I've been there before.#l\n#k
You did?\r\nThat is strange...I also feel as if I've experienced this before. Others have said the same.\r\nIt's as if we all had the same dream.
In any case, thank you. You've been a lot of help.\r\nYou can re-enter anytime you wish.
